directions: Drizzle apple slices with a little lime juice immediately after slicing. Stir remaining lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper together in a bowl. Add fennel, celery, and apple and mix well. Sprinkle with walnuts and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 bulb fennel, cored and thinly sliced crosswise
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Fennel-Celery Salad
